message:
"Unity in The Skies Above"

In hopeful stars, the night never fails,
One Gaza weeps, the other unveils.
Rockets scream, yet silence hails,
In fading echoes, humanity prevails.                       
Dove in the storm, peace always sails.
prompt: Civilians make up 61% of Gaza deaths from airstrikes, Israeli study finds The aerial bombing campaign by Israel in Gaza is the most indiscriminate in terms of civilian casualties in recent years, a study published by an Israeli newspaper has found. The analysis in Haaretz came as Israeli forces fought to consolidate their control of northern Gaza on Saturday, bombing the Shejaiya district of Gaza City, while also conducting airstrikes on Rafah, a town on
